src:
NOTÍCIA
Soldado da PM é morto durante assalto a gráfica em Fortaleza
O soldado era cliente e estava em atendimento no estabelecimento no momento do roubo
05 Nov 2019 by O Povo
O soldado da Polícia Militar do Ceará (PMCE), Paulo Henrique Siqueira, foi morto durante um assalto a uma gráfica no avenida Porto Velho,no bairro Henrique Jorge, em Fortaleza. O caso foi registrado nesta terça-feira, 5. A PMCE confirmou a morte do militar. 



Imagens do circuito interno da gráfica mostram que o criminoso anuncia o assalto por volta das 17h16min. O soldado era cliente e estava em atendimento no estabelecimento no momento do roubo. Henrique tenta reagir, saca a arma e atira, no entanto é atingido. O criminoso também foi baleado. O militar chegou a ser socorrido, mas não resistiu aos ferimentos.
O criminoso, conforme O POVO Online apurou, está sob escolta em uma unidade de saúde. 
Dúvidas, críticas e sugestões? Fale com a gente
text:
NEWS
PM soldier killed during assault on printing press in Fortaleza
The soldier was a client and was in attendance at the establishment at the time of the robbery.
05 Nov 2019 by The People
The soldier of the Ceará Military Police (PMCE), Paulo Henrique Siqueira, was killed during a robbery at a printing press in Porto Velho Avenue, in the Henrique Jorge neighborhood, in Fortaleza. The case was filed on Tuesday, 5. The PMCE confirmed the death of the military.



Images from the press's internal circuit show that the perpetrator announces the robbery around 5:16 pm. The soldier was a client and was in attendance at the establishment at the time of the theft. Henry tries to react, pulls the gun and shoots, but is hit. The criminal was also shot. The military was rescued, but could not resist his injuries.
The criminal, as The People Online has found out, is under escort at a health facility.
Questions, criticisms and suggestions? Talk to us
